Title: The people's railways, (expanding with) tremendous pace
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A 1952 series, devoted to the reconstruction of war damage and new construction of railways.The poster, "Railways across the country quickly repaired", shows repair works (with Soviet support) on the bridge over the Yellow River on the Beijing-Hankou line. Previously, the crossing took three hours, now only 6 minutes.
